title: HELP! CANT PLAY A GAME AT ALL. Low Priority countdown keeps resetting every 5 minutes!

replies.body: Same here. I've been in low priority queue for about 5 hours now without finding a game. The timer resets every 5 minutes. Hard to play out my five punishment games when I can't even find one game...

You can't; this is a currently known bug in the game. Strange that it's resetting every five minutes, usually people say it resets every ten-twenty minutes.

My suggestion is to just follow the Summoner's Code in game. :)
